welcome.subheader:
Putting Challenges central.
Allowing everyone to contribute.
Enabling connections and finding capability.
welcome.body: Realising society's potential. Building a better future, together.
welcome.join: Want to join the community and see more?

interested-in-collaboration.innovation-facilitator:
Are you driving Innovation in your community or organization?
Please reach out and we can schedule a one-on-one session!
interested-in-collaboration.suggestions:
Do you have suggestions for Challenges where Alkemio can help?
Please share on our discussions and join the community!
interested-in-collaboration.contributor:
Do you want to contribute to or support Alkemio?
100% open source. Backed by a non-profit foundation.

getting-started.subheader: Here are some suggestions to help get you up to speed.
getting-started.connecting-with-people: Want to see who is contributing? Explore all contributors.
getting-started.joining-a-challenge: Eager to join a Challenge? Explore all Challenges.
getting-started.your-profile: Keen to be found by other contributors? Fill out your profile.

hub.subheader:
Each Hub contains one or more Challenges, providing shared context and community for Challenges hosted there.
A space to coordinate and collaborate. Connect.
hub.body: A Hub can be Public or Private, and has a facilitating Organization.

community.helpText: Activity is calculated based on their contribution to challenges, profile completeness, etc.

canvas.subheader: Create your custom visualization and share it with others.
canvas.no-canvases: No canvases have been created yet. Be the first to add one.

state.available: You are free to work on this canvas

state.unknown: There is a checkout conflict with this canvas

delete.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete this canvas? The action is irreversible.

steps.naming: Define a suitable name for your canvas. What will your canvas capture?
steps.templating: Choose from the list of templates if you want to use it as a blueprint for your canvas.
steps.completing: The canvas will be created with the following parameters

template.no-templates: There are no templates defined here yet. Be the first to add one.

hub.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this hub can be used in every challenge and opportunity that this hub hosts.

challenge.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this challenge can be used in every opportunity that is in the scope of this challenge.

about.title: Reimagining collaboration
about.description: Alkemio puts the Challenges central, each Challenge providing a central, neutral place for collaboration.
